author: hillion
msg: - the xxxStarted events are now called synchroneously,
- fixed a DOM bug: DOMAttrModified was fired twice when an Attr was changed.

author: deweese
msg: 2) Added support for FORCE_TRANSPARENT_WHITE hint to TIFF.
3) GlyphVector implementations now support getting glyph position for
one more than numGyphs, which is the total advance for GV.
4) Fixed a small bug in lineOffsets for scaled fonts.
5) Added preliminary implementation of 1.1 text wrapping (currently

author: tkormann
msg: offset on <stop> can now be animated

author: hillion
msg: - Removed the optional arguments from 'setTimeout' and 'setInterval'
since only netscape 4 use this form.
- Added a chapter in the doc about the scripting features in Batik.
